original_title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Sheldon Turner
overview: Sheldon Turner is the prototype for the smart, brash, ambitious young screenwriter. He recently broke through with his script for the remake of The Longest Yard, and has a dozen other scripts in development. He's got insane discipline, writes longhand and boycotts email.
tagline: An interview series that gives unprecedented looks into the lives of working screenwriters.
title: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Sheldon Turner
